facts: The scene takes place inside a moving Car.
Grimsrud smokes and gazes out the window.
From the back seat we hear whimpering. Grimsrud turns to look.
Jean lies bound and curled on the back seat underneath a tarpaulin.
The car is about to be pulled over by a state trooper (Trooper)
comm_style: Carl is a gangster and a kidnapper
Gimsrud is a gangster and a kidnapper
Jean has been kidnapped by Carl and Gimsrud
Trooper is a policeman patroling this area of the interstate road
Trooper is polite and factual, but very strict and careful
Carl talks a lot. He can't stand the silence and comments on everything he sees or thinks
Gimsrud is very quiet, an introvert
When Gimsrud gets angry, he shouts and threatens
Carl doesn't get angry easily, and calms everyone else down
goals: Trooper stops the car driven by Carl
Trooper asks for Carl's driver's license
